author: sussman
msg: Make 'svn merge' notice ancestry by default.
Create new --ignore-ancestry option as a way to override this behavior.
(svn_cl__merge):  pass ignore_ancestry option directly into svn_client_merge.
--ignore-ancestry to this test, because trees are unrelated.

author: breser
msg: STATUS: Merge r8368 and Issue #1690, remove vetos on them.  Invalidate clako's old vote.

author: kfogel
msg: Clean up errors and warnings in cvs2svn to have consistent formatting.
This is preparation for work on issues #1687 and #1698.
RepositoryMirror.is_prunable): Use error_prefix, and fix quoting.
CollectData.tree_completed): Use warning_prefix, and fix quoting.

author: dwhedon
msg: Revision 7740 changed the way the build finds stylesheets.  Update
documentation and build to take this into account.
* doc/book/README : Don't say the build will looks for stylesheets
in a different directory than tools/xsl/ since this is not true.
